data.title: Kelis Net Worth 2024: Quick Facts, Financial Overview, and FAQs
data.meta_description: Discover Kelis net worth in 2024, her income, financial overview, and important FAQs. Get in-depth analysis and updates on rachelparris.com.
data.text:
As an expert on celebrity finances for rachelparris.com, I’m here to provide an in-depth look at Kelis net worth in 2024, including her earnings and financial overview.

Quick Facts

FACTDETAILReal NameKelis RogersPopular NameKelisGenderFemaleBirth DateAugust 21, 1979Age44ParentsKenneth (father), Eveliss (mother)SiblingsThree sistersBirthplaceHarlem, New York CityNationalityAmericanEthnicityAfrican American, Chinese Puerto RicanEducationLe Cordon Bleu, Fiorello H. LaGuardia High School of Music & Art and Performing Arts, Manhattan Country SchoolMarital StatusWidowedSexual OrientationStraightWife/SpouseMike Mora (m. 2014–2022), Nas (m. 2005–2010)ChildrenThreeDatingBill MurrayNet Worth$2 millionSource of WealthMusic, Culinary VenturesHeight5 ft 9 in (1.75 m)

What is the Net Worth Of Kelis in 2024?

Kelis’ net worth in 2024 is estimated at $2 million. This places her among the richest singers ranking, though not at the very top. Comparing her to other notable figures:

Pharrell Williams

Nas

Chad Hugo

will.i.am

David Guetta

Benny Benassi

Moby

Kelis Finance Overview

Kelis has diversified her income through various channels over the years, contributing significantly to her net worth.

Earnings from Music Career

Album Sales and Revenue

Kelis’ albums have collectively sold over six million copies worldwide. Her debut album, Kaleidoscope, and follow-up albums Wanderland, Tasty, Kelis Was Here, Flesh Tone, and Food have all contributed to her revenue.

Notably, the single Milkshake brought her mainstream success, peaking at number three on the Billboard Hot 100 and earning significant royalties.

Hit Singles and Chart Performance

Her notable singles like Caught Out There, Bossy, and Acapella have added to her financial success. These hits have not only brought in direct revenue but also boosted her album sales.

Concerts and Tours

Performances and tours, such as those with Moby and U2, have been another lucrative source of income. Her live performances continue to attract fans, adding to her financial stability.

Collaborations and Features

Notable Collaborations

Kelis has worked with several big names in the industry, including Pharrell Williams, Chad Hugo, will.i.am, David Guetta, and Benny Benassi. These collaborations have not only increased her visibility but also her earnings.

Impact on her Net Worth

The financial benefits from these high-profile collaborations are substantial. Working with renowned artists and producers has ensured a steady stream of income from music royalties and performances.

Culinary Ventures and Income

Culinary Education and Training

Kelis trained at the prestigious Le Cordon Bleu, which laid the foundation for her culinary career.

Cookbooks and Cooking Shows

She authored the cookbook My Life on a Plate and hosted the TV show Saucy & Sweet on the Cooking Channel, both of which have contributed to her earnings.

Food Products and Business Ventures

Her sauce line, Bounty & Full, has been a successful venture. Launched at the Beverly Hills Food & Wine Festival, it has been rebranded and made available for general sale, adding another revenue stream.

Personal Investments and Real Estate

Real Estate Holdings

In 2019, Kelis purchased a 25-acre farm in Temecula, California for $600,000. This property is not only a home but also a source of potential income from farm produce and a planned restaurant.

Other Investments

While specific details are sparse, Kelis likely has other investments contributing to her net worth, ensuring long-term financial security.

Impact of Personal Life on Finances

Marriages and Divorce Settlements

Kelis’ marriages to Nas and Mike Mora had financial implications. Her divorce from Nas was particularly impactful, involving settlements and ongoing custody disputes.

Current Relationship

Her relationship with Bill Murray has made headlines, but its financial impact is less clear.

Awards, Recognition, and Their Financial Impact

Grammy Nominations and Wins

Kelis’ Grammy nominations, particularly for Milkshake, have boosted her marketability and earnings.

Other Awards and Recognitions

Awards like the Brit Award and NME Award have further solidified her reputation, contributing to her financial success.

FAQs about Kelis

What is Kelis’ full name?

Kelis’ full name is Kelis Rogers.

How many albums has Kelis released?

Kelis has released six albums: Kaleidoscope, Wanderland, Tasty, Kelis Was Here, Flesh Tone, and Food.

Who has Kelis collaborated with?

Kelis has collaborated with artists like Pharrell Williams, Chad Hugo, will.i.am, David Guetta, and Benny Benassi.

What is Kelis’ most famous song?

Kelis’ most famous song is Milkshake, which became a top hit and earned her a Grammy nomination.

Has Kelis won any awards?

Yes, Kelis has won several awards, including the Brit Award for International Breakthrough Act and the NME Award for Best R&B/Soul Act.

Where did Kelis receive her culinary training?

Kelis received her culinary training at Le Cordon Bleu.

What business ventures does Kelis have?

Kelis has a successful sauce line called Bounty & Full and plans to open a restaurant.

What is the name of Kelis’ cookbook?

Kelis’ cookbook is titled My Life on a Plate.

How many children does Kelis have?

Kelis has three children.

What is Kelis’ relationship with Bill Murray?

Kelis is currently dating Bill Murray.

Conclusion
